input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate

Item specifications:
3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror
9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high
Light greenish tint resembles glass
Polished beveled edges
To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
I am unfamiliar with the AIDA framework, but I can provide a brief description of the product using the item keywords and item specification.

This is a brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item in its original packaging. It is a Tactical Picatinny/weaver Rail Scope Mount 13 Slots for Mossberg 500,590,835.
input_text.Response B:
This GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate is made of a 3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror with a light greenish tint that resembles glass. It measures 9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high. The edges are polished and beveled.
To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
